headline: Pearson, Appian, WEX, and More Stocks See Action From Activist Investors
summary: 13D FILINGS These disclosures are from 13Ds filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission. 13Ds are filed within 10 days of an entity’s attaining more than 5% in any class of a company’s securities.

raw.headline: Pearson, Appian, WEX, and More Stocks See Action From Activist Investors

headline: Softer-Than-Expected Inflation Sparks Rally In These 10 Stocks
summary: U.S. inflation cooled to 2.4% in January, below expectations and the lowest since May 2025, boosting rate-cut hopes.
